categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Asset R-10 was a member of the intelligence network that served the independent operative known as the Shroud during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Around 3637 BBY, R-10 was dispatched by the Shroud to investigate the recent deaths of Assets R-3, R-27, and R-31.
